cease-desist-letter.title: Cease Desist Letter
cease-desist-letter.description: Stop someone from harmful actions like harassment, copyright infringement, or trademark violations. Legal warning letter.

breach-contract-notice.title: Breach Contract Notice
breach-contract-notice.description: Notify someone they've broken contract terms. Required first step before taking legal action for contract violations.

complaint-letter.title: Complaint Letter
complaint-letter.description: Formally complain about poor service, defective products, or unprofessional behavior. Gets better results than phone calls.

arbitration-agreement.title: Arbitration Agreement
arbitration-agreement.description: Resolve disputes through arbitration instead of court. Faster and less expensive way to settle business disagreements.

mediation-agreement.title: Mediation Agreement
mediation-agreement.description: Use a neutral mediator to resolve conflicts peacefully. Avoid costly court battles while finding mutually acceptable solutions.

settlement-agreement.title: Settlement Agreement
settlement-agreement.description: End legal disputes with negotiated settlement terms. Avoid trial costs while resolving claims and conflicts.

small-claims-worksheet.title: Small Claims Worksheet
small-claims-worksheet.description: Organize your case for small claims court. Helps you prepare evidence and arguments for disputes under $10,000.

court-filing-document.title: Court Filing Document
court-filing-document.description: Properly format legal documents for court submission. Ensures your paperwork meets court requirements and deadlines.

termination-letter.title: Termination Letter
termination-letter.description: End business relationships, employment, or contracts professionally. Provides clear notice and protects against legal issues.

contract-termination-letter.title: Contract Termination Letter
contract-termination-letter.description: Cancel contracts legally with proper notice. Protects you from breach of contract claims when ending agreements.

name-change-notification-letter.title: Name Change Notification Letter
name-change-notification-letter.description: Notify banks, employers, and agencies about your legal name change. Required to update all official records and accounts.

force-majeure-notice.title: Force Majeure Notice
force-majeure-notice.description: Invoke force majeure clause when natural disasters or emergencies prevent contract performance. Legal protection from penalties.

notarization-request.title: Notarization Request
notarization-request.description: Request notary services for documents requiring official verification. Ensures legal validity for important agreements.

general-inquiry.title: General Inquiry
general-inquiry.description: Make formal business inquiries with professional format. Better response rates for information requests and proposals.

affidavit.title: Affidavit
affidavit.description: Make sworn statements under oath for legal proceedings. Required for many court cases and official documentation.

affidavit-general.title: Affidavit General
affidavit-general.description: General sworn statement format for various legal situations. Flexible document for testimony and fact declarations.

affidavit-of-death.title: Affidavit Of Death
affidavit-of-death.description: Legally certify someone's death for estate and insurance purposes. Required to transfer assets and collect benefits.

affidavit-of-heirship.title: Affidavit Of Heirship
affidavit-of-heirship.description: Establish who inherits property when someone dies without a will. Proves family relationships for asset transfer.

affidavit-of-identity.title: Affidavit Of Identity
affidavit-of-identity.description: Prove your identity for legal proceedings when official ID is lost or questioned. Sworn statement of who you are.

affidavit-of-survivorship.title: Affidavit Of Survivorship
affidavit-of-survivorship.description: Transfer jointly-owned property to surviving owner after death. Avoids probate for property held in joint tenancy.

immigration-affidavit.title: Immigration Affidavit
immigration-affidavit.description: Support immigration applications with sworn statements about relationships, employment, or financial support.

small-estate-affidavit.title: Small Estate Affidavit
small-estate-affidavit.description: Transfer small estates without full probate proceedings. Faster and cheaper way to distribute modest inheritances.

incident-report.title: Incident Report
incident-report.description: Document workplace accidents, property damage, or security incidents. Creates official record for insurance and legal protection.

accident-report.title: Accident Report
accident-report.description: Record details of vehicle accidents, injuries, or property damage. Essential for insurance claims and legal proceedings.

covid19-health-screening.title: Covid19 Health Screening
covid19-health-screening.description: Screen employees and visitors for COVID-19 symptoms. Workplace safety tool to prevent virus spread.

insurance-claim-form.title: Insurance Claim Form
insurance-claim-form.description: File insurance claims for damages, theft, or covered losses. Proper documentation helps get claims approved faster.

bid-proposal.title: Bid Proposal
bid-proposal.description: Submit competitive bids for contracts and projects. Professional format increases chances of winning business.
